description: Clipper 25 SC is a plant growth regulator containing Paclobutrazol. It is used for growth control and yield enhancement in various crops. Paclobutrazol belongs to the triazole fungicide class but functions as a growth regulator rather than a fungicide.
side_effect: Follow manufacturer's safety guidelines. Use protective equipment during application. Not suitable for water ripening applications.
crops_pests: Various crops for growth regulation and yield enhancement
crops: Rice, Potato, Cabbage, Brinjal, Chili, Tomato, Cucumber, Okra, Cauliflower, Gourd, Ginger, Capsicum
symptoms: Poor plant growth, excessive vegetative growth, reduced flowering, low fruit set, stunted development
causes: Imbalanced plant hormone levels affecting growth and development
